description:
This performance-oriented classic ski is ideal for recreational skiers who don't want to outgrow their set-up or build up an arsenal of grip waxes. A classic parallel profile with minimal sidecut delivers speed and a long smooth glide on groomed terrain. Mohair skin patches provide exceptional grip and silent glide in all conditions, no grip wax needed! The medium version is suitable for skiers who want to keep ski length manageable.

  • Densolite 2000 shaped foam core with fiberglass wrap is light and responsive
  • S-cut, light carving sidecut behind the foot with a wider platform at the front for control and stability
  • eSkinGrip+ waxless technology uses an integrated strip of skin underfoot so you don't need grip wax
  • Digital control of the moulding press allows optimal flex and camber for specific performance on snow
  • Heel-Toe Camber provides easy kick and compression when pressing with the forefoot but remains lifted when pressing with the mid or rear of the foot
  • Precise stone grinding for easy glide in all snow conditions
  • Pre-mounted Prolink Shift Bindings included
name: Salomon RC7+ eSKIN X-Stiff + Prolink Shift Binding
